content.title: Import the Web App
content.body:
1. From the main menu of the Iris, navigate to Forge > Browse.
    The Volt MX Forge window appears
  2. On the search bar, enter, Recipients Web.
  3. In the list that appears, select Recipients Web.
    The details of the RecipientsWeb app appears.
  4. Click Import to Workspace.
    It may take some time for Iris to import the app.
